content:
Question 43 of 50
Single choice question
You create an App Service plan named
Plan1 and an Azure web app named
webapp1.
You discover that the option to create
a staging slot is unavailable.
You need to create a staging slot tor
Plan1.
What should you do first?
Select the correct answer
From Plan1, scale up the App Service plan
From webapp1, modify the Application settings
From webapp1, add a custom domain
From Plan1, scale out the App Service plan
